name: Akbuzat
shortLoreBlurb: Akbuzat is a creature from Bashkir linked to sky horse, river. Connected to tempests and rulership omens. Appeased for safe waters and rain.
overlapsLinks: Indra (Vedic), Naga (India/SE Asia), Perun (Slavic), Poseidon (Greek), Tangaroa (Polynesia), Thor (Norse), Yemaya (Yoruba), Zeus (Greek)
description: Akbuzat is a creature from Bashkir linked to sky horse, river. Connected to tempests and rulership omens. Appeased for safe waters and rain.
